name: rinko
normalized: outrageous.
as soon as she entered the room, rinko frowned.
she had had an unpleasant hunch based on its nakedly aristocratic outward appearance, and it was just as she expected.

name: rinko
normalized: （this is a dorm, in spite of everything?
a private room alone would be a luxury, and yet, for it to be this extravagant… it's like a hotel.

name: rinko
normalized: （people who spend time sponging off their parents in places like this must be wimps, i guess.
this place was seishuu academy, a room in the maid course student girls' dormitory.
it had been allocated to rinko, who had moved in today.
she was going to live here for a while.

name: rinko
normalized: now…
in accordance with the theory behind infiltrations, rinko first started checking that there was no kind of camera or listening device in the room.

name: rinko
normalized: if yukikaze were here, she'd know in an instant, though, wouldn't she?
this sort of thing was tatsurou's strong point, too.

name: rinko
normalized: at any rate, this is too big.
this is a single room for a student, isn't it?
half of this, no, a third of it would be enough.

name: rinko
normalized: anyway, i don't feel relaxed if it's this large.
i suppose heating and cooling wouldn't be effective, either.
so, what do the rich people do?
she complained, while holding a detector that she had brought along against the walls and ceiling and floor.
she confirmed that nothing was hidden in the antique western furniture, the miscellaneous furnishings, the poor excuse for a desk that had been set up, etc.
checked the electrics of the lights and outlets; flipped over the picture frames (which had abstract paintings in them that she didn't understand at all);
crawled under the luxurious double bed (which rinko, who preferred a futon and a tatami mat, wasn't a bit happy about) to check there;
thoroughly inspected the washroom, toilet, cupboards and sanitary waste box; and even opened the lid of the water tank.

name: rinko
normalized: hmm, seems all right.
after taking about thirty minutes to confirm that there were no problems, rinko finally pulled out the chair from the writing desk and sat down on it.
however, looking over “her room” again, she felt strangely uncomfortable, and stood up immediately.

name: rinko
normalized: …i'm still restless.
even if this was a mission, it was far too different from rinko's home, the estate of the akiyama family, who taught the prestigious stray blade style.
after wandering idly around the room, rinko tried looking out the window for the time being.
like the room, which had a strangely cooped-up feeling despite being so spacious, the view wasn't nice at all.
mountains which towered as if to wall in the entire school, and in the middle of them, a river and forest which further separated the general course students from the scholarship students.

name: rinko
normalized: tatsurou's over there, huh…?
she could see buildings which appeared to be the general course student dormitories――no, right now it was the middle of class, so would he be in the school building instead?

name: rinko
normalized: …well, i did become a student by my own choice, after all.
should i make do for now?
rinko had agreed to that.

it was certainly the case that, after receiving a request from tatsurou and shizuru, she had been chosen to be in charge of “battle”, but there was no need for rinko to infiltrate the place as a student.
even without going that far, she could contact those two in secret, and plan some coordination with them in a briefing session while she took care of the fighting.
that was the theory behind this kind of mission.
however, rinko had purposely taken the seishuu academy transfer exam, and furthermore, became not a general course student, which tatsurou was, but a maid course student.
she had persuaded her superiors that that would be more advantageous for the mission.
tatsurou wasn't told about that.
this was because, though even she couldn't believe it, rinko had started wanting to wear it badly――indeed, no matter what.
the uniform of a seishuu academy maid course student.
which was to say, a maid outfit.
and so, today, she had finished the various formalities for her first day of school, put on the maid clothes she had been handed, and come along to the student dormitory.

name: rinko
normalized: fufu.
rinko made an excited smile to herself, then opened the dresser door wide and stood in front of the mirror.
a jet-black skirt and corset, a bright-white frilly apron and cap, and bright-red ribbons on her chest and the left and right of her head.
a rinko who had transformed into a maid was reflected back at her.

name: rinko
normalized: not bad.
not bad!
facing the mirror, rinko turned right, turned left, turned around and looked back, and then nodded in apparent satisfaction.

name: rinko
normalized: it's quite fresh, for me.
this kind of thing is nice once in a while.

name: rinko
normalized: no doubt tatsurou's going to be surprised by his sister's appearance.
hmhmm.
she raised her apron a tiny bit with both hands, and tried striking a pose.

name: rinko
normalized: ah… come to think of it…
she had a feeling there had been a scene in one of tatsurou's manga where a maid tried twirling around.
should she give that a go, as a test?
but, for her, the person called the “slasher oni taimanin”, to twirl around in maid clothes, even as a joke――

name: rinko
normalized: well, still, it's a rare occasion, after all.
besides, it's only me here.
yeah, there's no problem.
everything's an experience.
while making excuses on her own, rinko looked around nervously, even though there was nobody there, after which

name: rinko
normalized: okay, one, two…
she spread both arms, put a bit of energy into it, and
twirl☆
turned around.

name: rinko
normalized: wow♪
her somewhat short skirt spread out weightlessly, and the frills of her apron fluttered adorably.

name: rinko
normalized: kuu～～♪
jiin☆
something had directly touched rinko's girly side, which rarely showed on the surface.

name: rinko
normalized: th, this is nice.
tatsurou will be delighted.
one more time.
twirl☆

name: rinko
normalized: i feel pretty cute, if i do say so myself.
yeah, definitely cute♪
while she was happily twirling like that, she made eye contact with herself in the mirror.

name: rinko
normalized: ah…
that rinko was making a girly face, which didn't seem like her at all.
she suddenly came to her senses.
her face was hot, like it had caught fire.

name: rinko
normalized: wh, what am i doing?
i came here on a mission.
what am i doing, messing around in a maid outfit like this?
am i stupid?
making a bright-red face and scolding herself, rinko slammed the dresser door closed.
it felt like if she kept looking, she would start doing something silly again.
she really ought not to be doing things that she didn't normally do.

name: rinko
normalized: maid clothes are pretty dangerous, aren't they?
i'll use caution.
while looking out of the window, with its bad view, rinko was trying to forget about just before, when
――konkon.
someone knocked on the door at the entrance.

name: rinko
normalized: yes!
rinko practically jumped, and rushed for the door.
she took one slow breath in and out, then put her hand on the knob.
from this day forth, she was not a taimanin, nor a student of gosha academy, but a maid course student here.

name: rinko
normalized: i'm sorry to keep you waiting.
please come in.
while letting out a voice so formal that even she thought it was over-the-top, rinko opened the door.

name: rinko
normalized: （washizu shigeru and… who's this?
there was washizu shigeru, who was the most important figure this time around.
and a tremendously sinister-eyed man, who clearly had the face of a bad guy.
the fact that he was wearing a seishuu academy uniform seemed to mean that he was a student here, though――

name: rinko
normalized: （damn washizu.
why bring a guy like this to my room?
without letting one bit of her suspicion show, rinko put both hands on her knees and bowed her head with a cheerful smile, as was appropriate for a maid course student.

name: rinko
normalized: kouchou-sensei.
welcome.

name: washizu
normalized: akiyama-san, i was wondering if you liked your room?

name: rinko
normalized: yes.
thank you for everything today.
i was very surprised that the dormitory would have gorgeous private rooms like this.

name: washizu
normalized: maid course students aim to be professionals who will serve the elites of the elites.

name: washizu
normalized: naturally, this treatment and environment vary greatly from those of a typical maid.

name: washizu
normalized: this school's motto is practical education.
the rooms of this dormitory are also intended for a student to grow more accustomed to an upper-class environment than their own home.

name: rinko
normalized: is that so?
i was surprised, since it's completely different from the world i know.
it's a privilege to be able to learn in such a wonderful environment.

name: washizu
normalized: that's right.
i suppose so.
washizu smiled broadly due to rinko's words, which were quite honour student-like.

name: rinko
normalized: （you're sure good at acting.
i'm not one to talk, though.
at a glance, he was the education-obssessed headmaster who had showed rinko, a mere transfer student, around the school earlier.
but there was hardly any doubt that this washizu was the enemy ringleader.
the chairman of the washizu group, a federation of companies derived from the pre-war washizu zaibatsu.
since retiring from the front line at age 70, with many large corporations under its umbrella, he had worked hard at the administration of the washizu school group educational corporation.

he was personally serving as headmaster at seishuu academy, which sought to rear the elites who would play key roles in japan's political and financial worlds, and did his utmost to educate young people.
he was like that in public.

but in fact, he was an underworld fixer who had strong influence in political and business circles, and was feared as “the youkai” based on his youthful appearance, which didn't look like that of an 82-year-old.
more importantly, he had an uncle-nephew relationship with that yazaki muneichi, who was the eldest son of his late younger sister, yazaki hisako.
in which case, one could easily guess washizu shigeru's true nature.
not to mention, where being involved in the manufacture of the microchips that had been implanted in rinko and yukikaze was concerned――

name: rinko
normalized: （we definitely have to punish him.
while deciding so in her mind, but not revealing that, rinko asked about the boy who had been directing a rude look at her for some time.

name: rinko
normalized: by the way, kouchou-sensei, who might the person behind you be?

name: washizu
normalized: oh, that's right.

name: washizu
normalized: he is kuroi ryuuji-kun, a third-year scholarship student.

name: kuroi
normalized: nice to meet you, akiyama-san.
kuroi said, politely in tone of voice only, without changing the look in his eyes.

name: rinko
normalized: my name is akiyama rinko.
i have moved in to the seishuu academy maid course starting today.
it is nice to meet you, kuroi-san.

name: kuroi
normalized: hmph.
kuroi snorted slightly at rinko, who had greeted him respectfully.

name: rinko
normalized: （what's with this man?
how rude.
as the acting head of the stray blade style family, if her students took this kind of attitude, she would order a thousand practice swings, but here, she pretended not to notice.
instead, she nonchalantly sized up this extremely rude man.

name: rinko
normalized: （he doesn't seem to know martial arts, but he has a toned body.

name: rinko
normalized: （a sportsman… no, that's not it, is it?
this is a body that's been trained through fighting.
and, he's the kind of guy who pretends to be a lone wolf.

name: rinko
normalized: （he's able to take such an inappropriate attitude in this place, an ostensibly elite school, and what's more, washizu shigeru's taken the trouble to bring him here, so that means…）

name: rinko
normalized: （this guy's the son of a big shot or something.
a moron who relies on his parents' power to do whatever he likes… is that it?
while she was thinking things like that, washizu began an explanation for whatever reason.

name: washizu
normalized: as i explained some time ago, akiyama-san, valets or maids wait on the scholarship course students.

name: washizu
normalized: pupils on the valet course wait on the female students, and pupils from the maid course on the male students.
which means that over three years, they spend the time in a genuine master-and-servant relationship.

name: rinko
normalized: yes, you told me it was like that.
rinko nodded, while mentally cocking her head.
that was in line with the information she had studied previously, but it was a strange story, considering that they had modelled this system on the western aristocracy.
over there, it was normal for maids to wait on female nobles, and valets on male nobles.
in other words, it was same-sex.
in this school, they were purposely making that opposite-sex.
she wasn't very happy with them changing just that part, when they were trying to do an imitation of the west.

name: rinko
normalized: in our conversation before, you said the pairing of the people from the scholarship course with those of the maid course was already finished, and it would take a little while before my partner is found…
after saying that much, rinko got a bad feeling.

name: rinko
normalized: （no way, this sinister-looking boy?

that was just a short while ago.

name: rinko
normalized: left school?
a short while?
why?

name: washizu
normalized: that i cannot tell.

name: washizu
normalized: however, there is one consolation in this misfortune.
kuroi-kun is a third-year, and akiyama-san is a third-year as well.
you're essentially in the same grade, so we have arranged for you to form a pair.

name: washizu
normalized: kuroi-kun is a genius who has constantly gotten top marks for three years, and akiyama-san is also a talented woman who got a perfect score on the entrance exam.
naturally, it would be appropriate to pair you together.
ah, what a relief.

name: rinko
normalized: ah, ahh, is that so?

she had only had an interest in the cute maid uniform, and didn't want to go along with this aristocratic education system.
in carrying out the mission, as well, it would definitely be easier for a master-and-servant pairing not to be arranged.
she had been relieved to hear that she would have no partner, but for a student to suddenly leave school, and create an opening among the scholarship students…

name: rinko
normalized: （it's a pretty bad omen, isn't it?

so now you can be relieved.

name: rinko
normalized: yes.

kouchou-sensei, kuroi-san.

name: washizu
normalized: um-hmm.

normalized: hmph.

normalized: got it.

the bad look in his eyes had gotten even worse.

name: rinko
normalized: （this, the instant washizu's gone?
what's with this man?

normalized: i expect you'll learn the basics of being a maid in class sooner or later, but i'm gonna give your incompetent self plenty of guidance.

name: rinko
normalized: y, yes.

normalized: that's, “yes, goshujin-sama”.

normalized: yes, goshujin-sama…

after she became completely unable to sense kuroi's presence, rinko finally raised her head.

name: rinko
normalized: you're the one who's a nobody.
spoiled rich kid poser!

name: rinko
normalized: i wore the maid clothes.

when we head back, i'll give that poser's face a punch.

and so――

name: rinko
normalized: my name is akiyama rinko.
from this day forth, i will have the privilege of studying in the seishuu academy maid course with all of you.
it's nice to meet you.
after noon, rinko attended class.
the maid course had only 60 students in total, or 20 per class over three years.

this was because there were only 60 male scholarship students in the whole school, and similarly, the female scholarship students, and the valet course students they would be paired with, numbered 60 each.
with those scholarship students, maid course students and valet course students, 240 people in total were studying every day at seishuu academy's so-called “elite building”.
that being said, the elite building was for the 120 scholarship students, and the maid course and valet course students were merely an extra on top of that.
even physically, the elite building was completely isolated from the general course student area by a river which bisected the academy grounds, and a forest beyond the bridge that crossed over it.
the general course students were prohibited under school regulations from even entering the elite building.
and, as rinko had already understood, maids and valets were assigned to each and every scholarship student, and they were locked into a master-and-servant relationship.

name: rinko
normalized: （aristocratic tastes are egregious, aren't they?
how asinine.
she had figured as much, but since they tried to make this aristocratic school deadly serious, the maid course curriculum was one which went into the tiniest of details.

starting with maid guidelines, they taught various things, such as laundry, dusting, cooking, waitressing, child-minding, gardening, high society etiquette, conversation with one's master, and receiving guests.
even just taking those related to meals, they covered knowledge of the cuisine of various countries, the etiquette of that, knowledge of wine, brands of black tea――too many topics to count.
and, probably for the sake of entertaining guests from other countries, they even put effort into the study of foreign languages, such as english, french, italian, german and chinese.

name: rinko
normalized: （haah, it's tough to be a maid.
all i wanted was this outfit.

while lamenting things like that, she was feeling relieved that the lesson on latin (which she hadn't understood at all) was over, when tagaki miku, who was sitting in the next seat to the right, called out to her.

name: miku
normalized: hey, akiyama!
akiyama, you have a sec?

the instant rinko answered,

name: classmates

name: rinko
normalized: wha?!

akiyama-san's like that too.

name: midori
normalized: tachibana-san wasn't very good at self-defence.
she didn't make any effort, either.
that's why she ended up like that.

name: miku
normalized: hey, quit it!
one person seemed to have let something slip.
the maids uniformly made uncomfortable-looking faces.

name: rinko
normalized: um… that tachibana-san person was kuroi-sama's last maid, yes?

name: miku
normalized: yeah, that's right.
briefly.
she dropped out.
ah, you already know?

name: rinko
normalized: for what reason?
i'd like you to tell me, if you don't mind.

name: midori
normalized: eh?
there's no need for akiyama-san to worry.
she quit school, and she's not a maid or anything anymore.

name: megumi
normalized: if anything, kuroi-sama will be happy she's gone.
to put it bluntly, she wasn't suitable for kuroi-sama.

name: misaki
normalized: she's gone, so stop bad-mouthing her.

name: megumi
normalized: that is true, isn't it?

name: misaki
normalized: you're right…

name: rinko
normalized: （looks like i touched upon a bad topic.

name: midori
normalized: ah, i have to go now.
i'll get scolded by goshujin-sama.

name: miku
normalized: wait, wait, i'm going too.
later, akiyama.
akiyama had better hurry too!

name: rinko
normalized: yes.
thank you very much.
she didn't know what they were rushing off for, but the maids left, scattering in all directions like baby spiders.
ultimately, it ended before she had time to find out why kuroi's previous maid left school.
but still, it seemed there weren't many good reasons for asking.
judging from that way of speaking, had she become disabled for life in a self-defence lesson or something?

name: rinko
normalized: this seems like a threatening place, doesn't it…?
left on her own in the classroom, rinko made a daring smile.
if anything, that calmed her down.
besides, it was good news that kuroi was a relative of washizu.
if she could gain kuroi's trust, she might be able to investigate various things about washizu through that.

name: rinko
normalized: where that's concerned, i'll have no choice but to fully become one of those annoying, unpleasant maids, huh…?
if it had a direct connection to the mission, she would resign herself to it for a little while.

name: rinko
normalized: （well, i wonder what to do after this today.
shall i go check out tatsurou's situation…?
thinking so, she was about to leave the classroom, where nobody was, when the sound of another person's footsteps drew near.
it was not one of her classmates from before.
this was the footstep sound from when a taimanin pretended to be a normal person.

name: rinko
normalized: （also, a woman.
not tatsurou.
given that…）

name: shizuru
normalized: there was still a girl left here?
go to your master already.
oh.
it's the first time i've seen your face.
a person with glasses and a suit, a look that really said female teacher, came in and started talking to rinko.

name: rinko
normalized: i assume you're kousaka shizuru-dono.
i'm akiyama rinko.
i have come to take up my post today.

name: shizuru
normalized: looks like i've already been found out by my presence, huh?
that's what i'd expect from the slasher oni taimanin.
i've heard rumours about you.
i'm glad you're our helper.
nice to meet you.
“flower shizuru” herself, kousaka shizuru, smiled calmly.
a user of the tree escape arts, who spawned vegetation at will and manipulated it.
an infiltration mission specialist.
being gifted with both genius and beauty, she communicated in six languages and had two doctorates, with expert knowledge spanning dozens of fields.
she was a jack-of-all-trades, and a skilled taimanin who excelled at dangerous solo infiltration missions.

name: rinko
normalized: my little brother is indebted to you.

name: shizuru
normalized: yes, i'm looking after him a lot.
it's touch and go, since he's still inexperienced.
being told something like that all of a sudden, rinko felt ashamed.

name: rinko
normalized: i apologize.
kuh, that idiot…

name: shizuru
normalized: ahaha, sorry.
that was a lie.

name: rinko
normalized: eh…?

name: shizuru
normalized: a lie.
tatsurou-kun's doing really well.
he's fully fledged, as a man and as a taimanin.
i've been helped by him time and time again.
i'm the one who's in his debt.
shizuru said, making a serious face.
that manner of speaking was not flattery.
rinko could see definite confidence in tatsurou.

name: rinko
normalized: is, is that so…?
that's, um… thank goodness.
she had been worried that tatsurou, who was still a beginner, would be a burden.
knowing that wasn't the case, rinko reflexively smiled, but

name: shizuru
normalized: fufu, tatsurou-kun was grumbling, 『rinko-nee is always tough on me』.
it looks like you really are a strict onee-san, eh?
being told that, her face became red.

name: rinko
normalized: wh, what is that idiot saying?
honestly.
what was he thinking, making complaints about his older sister to another person?
she would have to take him to task later.

name: shizuru
normalized: you're given to underestimating your sibling's ability, yes?
yet, tatsurou-kun's carrying out the mission splendidly.
he's really dependable.

name: rinko
normalized: if i'm told that by a person of kousaka-dono's calibre, i can rest easy.
please take care of my little brother after this, too.

name: shizuru
normalized: i'm the one who should ask that from him.
i'll rely on tatsurou-kun.

name: rinko
normalized: thank you very much.
rinko blushed as she bowed her head at shizuru, who smiled amicably.

name: shizuru
normalized: so, how about it?
what's your impression of this school?

name: rinko
normalized: i'm astonished, but i'm determined to fully become a maid course student.

name: shizuru
normalized: yeah, go for it.
a maid outfit really suits you.
cute!

name: rinko
normalized: uh, thank you very much…
rinko, who was normally never called cute by anyone, made her face red again.
shizuru giggled at rinko.

name: shizuru
normalized: anyway, you'll get used to it.
and then there's the student named kuroi, who's become your master… you've met already, right?

name: rinko
normalized: yeah, i heard from my classmates that he's washizu's relative.
as soon as i met him, he took an insolent attitude, but it's all right.
i'll put up with it.

name: shizuru
normalized: i suppose that'll be tough, but please do.
it'll help if you can gain his confidence and investigate some things.

name: rinko
normalized: that's the plan.

name: shizuru
normalized: and, there are also facilities that only scholarship course students can enter, so it would help if you could assist with investigating them.

name: rinko
normalized: this elite building and the dormitories, right?

name: shizuru
normalized: indeed.
i've only reached the point where i can enter the elite building recently, so i'll leave that to you.

name: rinko
normalized: understood.
rinko nodded.
it seemed that there were places a student could enter more easily than a teacher.
and vice versa.

name: shizuru
normalized: all that's left to say is…
shizuru had been thinking a little, but suddenly stiffened her expression.
rinko immediately surmised the reason for that.

name: rinko
normalized: someone's approaching this way, huh?
these footsteps are――
it was that man.
rinko openly frowned.

name: shizuru
normalized: that face is unacceptable for a maid greeting her master.
while saying something like that, shizuru passed a note to rinko.
written on the note were shizuru's dormitory room number, and the time of a briefing session tomorrow.
it was written in special taimanin ink, and would disappear little by little when it came into contact with the air.

name: rinko
normalized: kousaka-sensei, thank you very much.

name: shizuru
normalized: if there's anything you can't get used to, do ask me about it, akiyama-san.
the pair exchanged words like a student and teacher, and shizuru left the classroom.
as if switching places with her, kuroi entered.

name: kuroi
normalized: rinko!
as soon as he spotted her, he went right up to her and raised his hand overhead.
she was going to be hit!
it would be easy to avoid that, but she purposely let it happen.
pann!
rinko's cheek made a high-pitched sound.

name: kuroi
normalized: what're you doing, rinko?!

name: kuroi
normalized: don't you understand the reason why the maid course's class ending time is set earlier than the scholarship course's?!

name: kuroi
normalized: it's an unbelievable disgrace for me to come get a maidservant like you myself!
moron!

name: rinko
normalized: i, i apologize, goshujin-sama.

name: rinko
normalized: （this scumbag!
despite detesting him in her mind, rinko bowed deeply.
come to think of it, the other girls had left in a panic, saying they would get scolded by their masters.
it seemed that it was customary for the maids of seishuu academy to go meet the scholarship students when class was over.
this meant she had broken that convention without warning, and thus, her master was in an extremely bad mood.

name: rinko
normalized: please forgive me, goshujin-sama.
i was having kousaka-sensei teach me some things, to prepare for me serving goshujin-sama from this day forth.

name: rinko
normalized: nevertheless, i humbly apologize for forgetting to meet goshujin-sama, a failure unbecoming of a maid.

name: kuroi
normalized: hmph, kousaka?
you seem to have learned a bit from that woman, huh?
while calling his teacher 『that woman』, kuroi suggestively curved his lips, which had already been curved as it was.

name: rinko
normalized: whatever do you mean?

name: kuroi
normalized: well, fine.
i'll praise that dedication to serving your master.
let's go.

name: rinko
normalized: yes, goshujin-sama.
kuroi suddenly turned around and went out of the classroom, and rinko followed behind him like a string of goldfish dung.

name: rinko
normalized: （he really is extremely rude.
i'm going to need considerable patience.

name: rinko
normalized: （even if the clothing is this cute, the job of maid really isn't for me.

name: rinko
normalized: （i was thinking of taking the opportunity to show tatsurou his sister dressed as a maid, yet i'm an escort for an idiot like this.

name: rinko
normalized: （well, i suppose i'll be able to meet with tatsurou at tomorrow's briefing session.

name: rinko
normalized: （going by what kousaka-dono said, it seems he's being quite useful, huh?
that's brash, for tatsurou.

name: rinko
normalized: （tomorrow night, huh?
i'll look forward to it.
at that point, i'll put these maid clothes――）

name: rinko
normalized: （no, wait, wait.
maid clothes would be strange in a briefing session.
it'll just seem like i'm wild with excitement, and going 『look, look!
』 no, i don't think i can do that.

name: rinko
normalized: （i know!
i'll go to the preparatory meeting in my taimanin outfit, and change into my maid clothes in kousaka-dono's room――）

name: rinko
normalized: （that's no good.
that's even stranger!
in that case, a fashion show.
that would be fine if it were only tatsurou, but kousaka-dono will be there too.
could i make a fool out of myself like that?!

name: rinko
normalized: （that means i'd better look for a different way to meet tatsurou, huh?
in the end, would it be more natural for fellow students to meet normally within the school…?

name: rinko
normalized: （but, how should i do it?
tatsurou, a general course student, can't come over here.
can i, a maid course student, go meet him normally?
would it be better to go in secret?

name: rinko
normalized: （i wish i could get in touch with tatsurou beforehand.
contacting him by cell phone has a danger of interception… mm, this is inconvenient.

name: rinko
normalized: um… goshujin-sama…
in the middle of coming out of the elite building and heading for the dormitories, rinko started talking to kuroi.

name: kuroi
normalized: what?
kuroi, who was walking ahead of rinko, replied without even looking back at her.

name: rinko
normalized: um, what would i have to do to see a general course student?

name: kuroi
normalized: is there some person you want to meet?

name: rinko
normalized: yes, i have a little brother in the general course.

name: kuroi
normalized: little brother, you say?
kuroi came to a stop, and looked back at rinko.
a look of curiosity was flickering in his eyes, which always seemed to exude haughtiness.

name: rinko
normalized: he's called tatsurou.
he's a general course second-year.

name: kuroi
normalized: hmph, a commoner who couldn't become a scholarship student?

name: rinko
normalized: i'm deeply ashamed!
rinko reflexively bowed her head.
that was because she had no confidence that she wouldn't make an angry face, and she felt like she was going to punch kuroi after much more of this.

name: kuroi
normalized: go meet your little brother, huh?
well, i guess that's fine.
she had thought he would say something like 『there's no need to meet a guy like that,』 but kuroi's response was a surprising one.

name: kuroi
normalized: if you want to meet a general course student, go to the cafeteria for general course students at lunch break.

name: kuroi
normalized: those guys can't come over here, but it's not prohibited to go from here to there.

name: kuroi
normalized: you can have a crappy meal over there, alone with your little brother.
i won't really stop you.

name: rinko
normalized: thank you very much, goshujin-sama.

name: kuroi
normalized: but, don't forget to obtain my permission.
as a rule, maids are at their masters' sides outside class time.

name: rinko
normalized: i understand!

name: kuroi
normalized: hmph.
perhaps because he was displeased with rinko, who had unintentionally made her voice shoot upwards, kuroi snorted and began walking again.

name: rinko
normalized: （i need permission to see my little brother?
honestly, that's ridiculous.

name: rinko
normalized: （still, if i need permission, then i'll get that permission straight away tomorrow, and go meet tatsurou.

name: rinko
normalized: （if i go to the cafeteria at lunch break, i won't seem weird at all in these maid clothes.
this is my uniform, after all.

name: rinko
normalized: （that tatsurou.
he's bound to be wide-eyed in surprise, fufu♪
while becoming strangely happy, rinko followed after kuroi.
